title: Dog refused to let the rain spoil his time outside
text:
The perfect outline left by Buddy refusing to move in the rain (Picture: Caters)

No – this is not a crime scene from a dog-themed Agatha Christie drama, it is the perfect outline left behind by a good boy refusing to give up a good time.

Labrador retriever Buddy didn’t let a little thing like torrential rain stop him from enjoying the great outdoors last week.

Paul Williams, from Newtown, Wales, said he called Buddy inside when the sudden downpour began.

But the laid-back animal refused to move a muscle and was happy to take the shower.

When the rain finally stopped, Buddy got up for a stroll, and the dry patch left behind was a perfect silhouette.

Owner Paul Williams called his puppy inside but Buddy refused to move (Picture: Caters)

Buddy managed to dry off and warm up inside later on (Picture: Caters)

Paul posted the picture to his Facebook page and was shocked when thousands of people commented on it.

He said: ‘It’s just a very funny photo and never expected such a great outline of him.

‘But I’m so glad I took the photo now as it makes me smile every time I now look at it.

‘It makes me happy that so many others have been able to take a little joy from it too.’
